mapper.select: SELECT * FROM INQUIRY I LEFT JOIN AGENT A ON (I.AGENT_NO = A.AGENT_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (I.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE I.STATUS = 'Y' AND I.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT MEMBER_NAME, CREATE_DATE, TITLE, CONTENT, AGENT_NAME, ANSWER_DATE, ANSWER_CONTENT FROM INQUIRY I, MEMBER M, AGENT A WHERE I.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO AND I.AGENT_NO = A.AGENT_NO AND I.INQUIRY_NO = #{inquiryNo}
